title: i love losing 1 lp every win with 58% wr
body: so i ended preseason silver 2, in jg as soon as i reached silver 3 my lp started downgrading, i was winning 23 lp and then i lost 1 at 0 lp after promos then win streaked, i won +21+20+20+19+18 and i didnt lost a single game in between, it's legit so stupid that the matchmaking try to force you in last season rank, it's tilting as fuck!

replies.body: What a clear and concise post with some excellent points. I assume you know what they are.
